Posts.Content: my hair is growing back too..not sure if it's an inch yet...but it's starting to curl up! I've always had straight hair. So glad my eyebrows came back! eyelashes are coming in slow. Isn't this exciting.....haha
Posts.Title: Ladies....when hair comes back...oh boy!

Posts.Content: I turned 40 this past August while I was on chemo. I finished chemo in early Oct. I was wondering have any of you pre-menopausal women gotten your period back after chemo finished or should I assume it's not coming back! I don't know whether to be excited or not! LOL thanks Chris.
Posts.Title: Menstruation and Chemo

Posts.Content: I am currently on 12 weeks of Taxol (finished 4 rounds of AC) to try and shrink my tumor to hopefully get a lumpectomy. If I haven;t even had surgery yet, why is my onco. telling me I will have 7 weeks of it? Not everyone I have spoken to has had radiation and chemo.
Posts.Title: Why am I being told I need Radiation if I haven;t even had surgery yet?
